Title: silverstripe/framework has Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in page name
Description: silverstripe/framework is vulnerable to XSS in Page name where the payload `"><svg/onload=alert(/xss/)>` will trigger an XSS alert.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.4.0-rc1 before 3.4.4, all versions starting from 3.5.0-rc1 before 3.5.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.4.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.4.4 before 3.5.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.5.2
